data.text: @angelos_frank @Surgeon_General Like I said it will be interesting to see what happens
@98Jabjab2 @Surgeon_General My point is, he had better be PREPARED to show the science or he will have to resign quickly...
@angelos_frank @Surgeon_General I suspect there might be another agenda at play here. Will he challenge you to a debate ?  highly unlikely!

@98Jabjab2 @Surgeon_General I DARE him to come for me...that will be the biggest mistake he EVER makes because I have the facts...and I will completely embarrass him
https://t.co/bmrpH7Pq4s
@angelos_frank @Surgeon_General No , but like I keep saying if you publish facts taken directly from governments websites from  around the world , how can that be illegal or misinformation..
@98Jabjab2 @Surgeon_General Have you seen what the SG is asking of the tech companies?

@angelos_frank @Surgeon_General So maybe he thinks the government organisations who give these answers to the public under freedom of information request act , are lying to the public with the answers they give to them.. Interesting , I wonder why they would give such answers knowing they are fraudulent?
@angelos_frank @Surgeon_General using another fake AF virus called sars cov 1 as their template lol and hahaha, it's "close enough", for govt. work anyway
@98Jabjab2 @Surgeon_General I am serious, he is looking to round up people like you and I...but that will be his worst mistake...I may slap a lawsuit on him as an individual...

@angelos_frank @Surgeon_General All my information is taken directly from official government websites , so does he suspect that the governments organisations who give these answers are lying with the answers they give to the public  .
